dict.string: Battery Drainer needs continuous location access for maximum GPS battery drain testing.
Battery Drainer uses location services for battery drain testing.
Battery Drainer needs camera access for video processing and 4K recording battery drain testing.
Battery Drainer needs microphone access for audio recording battery drain testing.
Battery Drainer needs motion sensor access for maximum sensor polling battery drain testing.
Battery Drainer uses NFC for continuous scanning battery drain testing.
Battery Drainer uses Bluetooth for continuous scanning battery drain testing.
Battery Drainer uses Bluetooth peripheral mode for battery drain testing.
